content.eamr: ( ing-1 "2 cups Italian-style seasoned bread crumbs" )

content.text: 0) Place flour in a shallow bowl.
1) Place breadcrumbs in a separate shallow bowl, and mix with ground black pepper and cayenne pepper.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Place"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "breadcrumbs"@9:20 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-1-0 "a separate shallow bowl"@24:47 / TOOL )
	)
	:inform ( ac-1-1 "mix"@53:56 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "ground black pepper"@62:81 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "cayenne pepper"@86:100 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Place eggs and water in a small bowl.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Place"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-4 "eggs"@9:13 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "water"@18:23 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-2-0 "a small bowl"@27:39 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 3) One piece at a time, coat the chicken in the flour, the eggs and the bread crumbs, and set aside.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "coat"@24:28 / AC
		:gol ( ing-6 "the chicken"@29:40 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "the flour"@44:53 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "the eggs"@55:63 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "the bread crumbs"@68:84 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-3-1 "set aside"@90:99 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Heat oil in a deep fryer to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Heat"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-7 "oil"@8:11 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-4-0 "a deep fryer"@15:27 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-4-0 "375 degrees F"@31:44 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-4-1 "190 degrees C"@46:59 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 5) In small batches, fry chicken 6 to 8 minutes, or until golden brown.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "fry"@21:24 / AC
		:ppt ( "chicken"@25:32 / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-5-0 "6 to 8 minutes"@33:47 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-5-0 "until golden brown"@52:70 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 6) In a separate small bowl, combine the mayonnaise, horseradish, sour cream, Worcestershire sauce and mustard.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "combine"@29:36 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-8 "the mayonnaise"@37:51 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "horseradish"@53:64 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-6-0 "a separate small bowl"@6:27 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( ing-10 "sour cream"@66:76 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-11 "Worcestershire sauce"@78:98 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-12 "mustard"@103:110 / FOOD )
	)
)
